full_summary:
=====================================================

### Tender Announcement: F1808-220534

#### Abstract:

The Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) is issuing a tender for the procurement of Towlines and Stretchers, as per the details outlined in Annex A.

#### Tender Information:

*   **Number of Solicitation:** WS3634761972
*   **Tender Reference:** WS3634761972-DOC3705631909
*   **Publication Date:** October 12, 2022
*   **Tender Closing Date:** November 9, 2022, 2:00 p.m. local time
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** November 22, 2022

#### Tender Status:

*   The status of this tender is Cancelled and will not proceed further.

#### Tender Description:

The DFO requires the procurement of Towlines and Stretchers in accordance with Annex A.

#### Selection Criteria:

*   The award of the tender will be based on the lowest price submitted by the bidders.

#### Trade Agreements:

This tender is subject to the Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement.

#### Regions of Delivery:

*   The goods/services required by this tender will be delivered in Canada.

#### Contracting Entity:

*   The contracting entity for this tender is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC).
*   Contact Information:
    *   Jason Smith (SPAC/PSPC)
    *   Jason.smith@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
*   End User Entities:
    *   The end user for this tender is the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO).

#### Attachment:

No attachments are available for this tender. 

#### Notice URL:

A detailed notice for this tender is available at the URL: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14346055?extsite=MTQzNDYwNTVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==.

Note that I kept some details even the French ones, so we have a dual-lingual reference for our record-keeping. With a clearer and more direct format, we now meet professional guidelines while still meeting all the information requirements as per the previous design.
